I bought two of the "Belle Donne" camisole tops, both size medium. The seller gives the impression that the tops you will receive will be "Belle Donne" brand but there is no such thing. In reality they sent me a size small in the active basic brand in black and a olive in size medium in the Zenana brand. (the olive color isn't green, it's an odd  brown color with slight green undertones) If I would have known that the tops were going to randomly selected from a grab bag of cheap tops I wouldn't have spent 10 bucks a piece on them!
The active basic brand tops are slightly better than the Zenana brand, so I would recommend getting the active basic four pack by Active Products on Amazon. It's 15 to 20 bucks (depending on the colors you choose) for four camis. It's a better value and you will actually get the tops that you see on the website so there won't be any surprises!
summary: So much fail it's almost comical!

reviewText: This cami has the expected fit for its size and the fabric is stretchy abs comfortable. This is a good cami for an easy conversion to a nursing cami, good quality for the price, no need to shed 20-30 dollars for a nursing cami.
summary: Good for the price; shipped the wrong size

Don't have a ton of experience in these straps yet, but initially this looks and feels like a nice one.  Very similar in quality to my Maratac Nato strap, only the nylon on this one is a bit stiffer.  Feels just as thick (if not a hair thicker) than the Maratac, and the brushed hardware looks to be of the same quality as the Maratac hardware, albeit a little larger in size.  Time will tell obviously with respect to durability/fraying, but very pleased with this band right now--definitely worth what I paid for it.  For those of you out there with smaller wrists like me, just an FYI that the holes do not go as far in close as the Maratac; for reference, on the Maratac I have 5 extra holes to spare, and on this one I have 1.  Not a con, just worth noting; again, my wrists are very much on the small side, and I would imagine most people wouldn't have any issue with this.

reviewText:
This dress is very nice! I am 3 months postpartum and bought this dress to breastfeed at my brother's wedding. It is formal and pretty! I also love how long this dress is because I am tall and most dresses are too short for me. This dress falls right below my knee. The only part that did not fit me so well was the bust. It would be fine for a regular dress but too tight to breastfeed. I ordered size 3X and I'm 42D bra size. My mom was able to use the fabric from the sash and sew more fabric to the sides of the bust to make this fit better for nursing my baby. It fits great now and I can't wait to wear it!

P.S. Another great part about this dress is you can remove the fabric on the neckline for nursing when you are no longer nursing and want to make it a regular dress!
summary: Nice formal dress, great length and breastfeeding versatility!

I ordered these shoes for my 7 year old daughter to wear to a Father-Daughter Dance.  They were just perfect!  They were sparkly and the jewels caught the light beautifully.  My daughter was VERY excited to wear them to the dance and couldn't stop admiring them once she put them on.  Also, she had never worn a little heel before, so these made her feel very grown up.
My only complaint (which is why I docked a star) is that, as is often the case in beauty, they weren't very comfortable.  Once she arrived at the dance, she took them off after a few minutes of being on the dance floor and they mostly sat by her chair the rest of the night.  She tried to put them on a couple of times to dance in (because they were just so pretty!) but ended up taking them off after a minute or two.  As an adult, most of my dressy shoes are uncomfortable for dancing like that too.  Overall, I was very pleased with the shoes and the price.

reviewText: Ridiculously padded. I threw it away immediately. Not even worth the postage to return it!
I really like fit ! The bottom is truly cute on my curves. My thanks to the seller for prompt response in reference to size .

Okay, so firstly.
They sent me the wrong swimsuit! I ordered a white, v necked tassle bikini, and they sent me a strapless one...
"This isn't so bad, maybe it will look okay" it was horrible. I thought even if the top didn't work out, the bottoms are the same, but even the bottoms were a huge disappointment. There is literally NO elastic, they don't stretch at all. They are just cloth cut out into bikini bottom shape, with holes in the sides. Nothing like the slits on the hips in the picture. Also, they were ripped along one of the seams. I feel like I just bought something sewn together by a kid at a craft show.

Secondly, I tried on the top. It slipped down as soon as I took 2 steps. If I had actually gone swimming in it the entire beach wouldve gotten a show. It looked terrible, the lack of elastic (especially on the bottoms) made it look like I was barely squeezing into the suit, and I'm pretty skinny.

Thirdly, the fabric is see through. I could put my fingers behind it and see them perfectly. Nothing more to be said about that.

For the price, I was expecting to get something cheap. I was hoping it would at least fit, and look okay, and maybe last a couple uses. This was the biggest online purchase disappointment I've ever had.
summary: Huge waste of time and money. Buying this is a gamble, at best

reviewText:

now i see this same picture being used for other sellers for a higher price which discourages me from even attempting to re purchase this item idea from any one else....

The first time I wore the wig, it was kind of puffy, but then again it was my first time wearing a wig. I got used to it and it ended up fitting perfectly. It does look a bit more brown in certain lights, but I also like that because her hair is a redish-brown and people exaggerate on the red. This wig is easily my favorite out of the three I have now!! I also found someone else wearing the same wig at the Arizona Matsuri Festival!!

This wig is amaxing! I'm so glad I found it. It's brown with a red tint, but if you want it a brighter red, you can always dye it. It is a bit frizzy so that the choppiness of the characters hair can be exaggerated, but I easily fixed that with hairspray. It doesn't hurt your head after wearing it at a con all day! I would recommend this to anyone cosplaying Isabel.

Pale, freckle-faced girl here with Irish in her blood, so sun in large amounts of time and me don't mix very well. I needed a hat to wear at my in-laws' new pool where the whole family will hang out for hours at a time. I needed a hat that was not only cute, but also was waterproof and durable, as we like to lounge in the pool on the inflatable/float chaises. Hence, straw hats weren't a good option. This hat, however, does the trick just wonderfully. Thick material for protection. Material is some sort of nylon-ish blend, I think, and has held up for two months so far with getting pretty wet and having lots of sun exposure. Color has stayed fairly bright as well. An extra bonus was that its bendable/crushable, so i can stuff it in my swimming basket and not worry about ruining it that way either. It flattens back out fairly well.

I might have to buy another color or two next summer to go with future new swimming suits. I'll report back if any issues, but seriously, this is a very pale girl's dream come true!
summary: as we like to lounge in the pool on the inflatable/float chaises

First, I want to say that I already own these boots in the taupe color, size 6 1/2 and LOVE them.  They are super comfortable and I get so many compliments when I wear them I decided to get them in black as a gift to myself for Christmas.  I ordered them in a size 6 1/2 since I know that is my size.  I received the boots, box said size 6 1/2 and I wrapped them up and put them under the Christmas tree, did not try them on, why should I.  Opened them at Christmas, threw all the packaging away.  When I went to wear them a few days later I noticed that the right boot was a little tight.  My right foot is my larger one so I did not think much of it, plus when I purchased my original pair the sales woman total me that I might want to size down as they are real leather and stretch, which they did.  I figured that after wearing the new black ones a few times they would stretch some and would fit fine.  OH NO, they did not and I get a blister on my right heal when I wear them.  I even tried wearing thick socks and using a hot blow dryer to heat them up and walk around the house to stretch them to no avail.  So today, I just happened to cross my legs in a way that I could see the bottom of the boots, they both say size 6 on the bottom, not sizes 6 1/2.  I took both boots off and looked in side.  The left boot says 6 1/2, the right says 6.  Now I know why the right foot is so tight, WRONG SIZE!  And now it is to late to return them.  Very disappointed in the Quality Control!
summary: Very disappointed in the Quality Control!

I like how the back is adjustable so if I want them to be looser on my feet I can adjust that. I have very sensitive feet and get blisters easily, but with these sandals I did not have any issues.
The only negative thing I can say about them is that they are pretty slippery if the floor is wet, so be careful on wet surfaces! They are great for the beach or walking around, but if the surface is super smooth and wet then these shoes can be pretty slippery. Overall I love these sandals and will reorder more just to have another pair at home since i wear them so often I know I'll wear them out by the end of the summer. DO NOT order from this vendor!!!! I have had several issues with this bathing the suit AND the seller. First, it is way too small. I am normally a medium, but I ordered a large because of the reviews I read about it being slim-fitting, and it was still too small. Second, when I tried to return it, the seller denied me because "most people like this style". I am NOT "most people". Then they offered to give me a $3 refund. $3??!! That's not even 30% of the original price! I was able to talk them up to giving me $8 back for the product that I was forced to keep, that I will never be able to wear unless I get back to my high school weight (which is just ridiculous - I actually love my womanly body). On top of all that, the order was misplaced, so amazon gave me a refund to reorder everything. Well, the original order was found, so now I have TWO of these bathing suits, of which I cannot return. BUT WAIT, THERE'S MORE! When I got the second bathing suit, I noticed that it was NOTHING like the first one. These are supposed to be the same bathing suit! They were two different colors, made out of two different materials, different designs (one had a hook back and the other was attached all the way - one didn't even come with padding!), and the sizing was inconsistent too! If you got the suit and you love it, that's great because you really don't know what you are getting.

TLDR: don't trust this seller, got two of the same bathing suit (or was supposed to be the same), but different color/material/design/size, and they wouldn't allow me to return the suit because "most people like this design". THE. WORST. But hey, read the other reviews and order at your own risk.

I've included a photo of the dress and I will update later with a photo of what we did to the dress.

Update: My daughter is now married. She chose this dress because it had the flow and modesty factors that she was looking for in a wedding gown. The first picture shows what the dress looked like when we received it. We requested that the dress be made with no sequins, beading or trim. We, also, asked that the dress be made long with the addition of a short train.  We sent in her measurements and it was spot on!
Once we received the dress we added the Swarovski crystal trim around the neck and sleeves. Then we added the crystal appliqus to the front and back bodice. Finally, we attached a wide crystal belt/band to 2 1/2" wide grosgrain ribbon to make the sash.  The dress was beautiful and the bride stunning. It was exactly what my daughter had pictured in her mind!!! Thank you Dressystar for contributing to my daughters special day!

Love the support of Birkenstock sandals, and tend to wear them all summer. I have various styles and colors of Birkenstocks, which allows matching my sandals to my outfits, and choosing what is most appropriate to the occasion. That included a pair of gold metallic Gizeh style, which was dressy enough to accompany my black silk dress for dressy/casual events. Of course, that was the pair that my daughter's puppy decided to chew up beyond repair, leaving me without a dressy/casual option. I was unsuccessful in my search for a new pair of gold Gizeh Birkenstocks, but then found this style in textured gold. The triple buckle strap is very supportive, yet thin enough to look dressy. (In contrast, when Birkenstocks have double straps, the straps are much thicker, which gives it a sporty look.) Additionally, the textured gold tone is perfect ... provides added sheen without becoming ostentatious. Really love this purchase!

I was so excited to get these shoes. They are very stylish for a flip wedge. I "researched" and read so many reviews. It came down to this and one other pair. This pair was cheaper and as the saying goes...you get what you pay for. Within 2 weeks something broke or slipped in the ball area of the shoe which altered the internal structure. My right shoe started making this loud clicking noise when I walked. It was embarrassing. I literally had to alter the way I stepped down so it didn't make the noise. Ridiculous. Also, these flops are made a bit small and cause my feet to swell if I'm in them too long. I don't even know if I can return them. It's so late in the season I'll just buy the other pair I was contemplating next Spring.

Update: September 11th - a little more than a month (received these on Aug 4th) this happened (see photo). I was out with friend and had to find a CBS so I could buy some crazy glue and literally glue the shoe back together. I'm asking for my money back. We'll see if the company acknowledges the manufacturer defect and honors the return policy.

I checked every site I could to figure out the fit of these hoodies. I ended up thinking that since I wear a large in North Face and most surf/skate brands that this large might be slightly big/exact fit. I even thought I might go for a medium based on other reviews.

Well, I found that this is slightly small. Especially in my biceps area. They are not large or muscular, but they aren't teeny either. That area and my chest area seemed to be the tight areas here. I expected the chest area, but figured if necessary, opening the zipper would be the remedy. I suggest a XL for those that are on the fence. But would the arms be bigger in that size? I am not sure.

Other than the size, the hoodie is cute. It is much thicker than expected. Nice for autumn/winter. The graphic is clean. The seams look good. The zipper handle is a nice touch. It's a nice hoodie overall.

Make sure to get one with returns if you aren't sure on size. I was so sure about my research that I didn't. So I need to stretch out those arms or get my arms skinnier.
summary: Super cute, thick fabric, nice print inside hood, tighter than expected on upper arms.

reviewText:
This dress was just ok.  My main concern with this dress was that the beading and fabric look a little on the cheap side.  I've certainly see worse, especially when it comes to beading, but I was hoping for something a bit nicer.  I wouldn't feel comfortable wearing this dress to a nice event - I think I would feel too cheap, even if the fit was stellar (which it was not...).

I liked the back - the straps looked pretty - but the straps were a bit too spacious on me, so they ended up draping a bit.  That said, I'm quite slender and small-busted so this might not be a problem for everyone (or for all sizes of the dress).

Floor-length gowns tend to look good on me because I am long and lean (5'8, 115 lbs), but this style was not flattering for my body types.  The lack of defined waist made me look shapeless.  Again, maybe not a problem for every body type though.  The dress does not flare out as in the photo.  It was more of a straight line with a subtle flare.  The model's stance makes it look like more of a mermaid style than it actually was.

Fit issues did not factor into my rating.  My rating was based only on the quality of the gown.  I just included fit comments in case they help someone else when making a decision about the dress!
summary: A bit disappointed with the quality and shape

reviewText: I discovered Zederna insoles when searching online for relief for my sweaty feet.  My feet sweat, and then I have icy cold, clammy, uncomfortable feet.  I discovered that my feet are more comfortable if I do not wear socks at all.  This winter, I have been using Zederna insoles with no socks and my feet have been warmer this winter than in any years past. My feet still sweat, but the ongoing dampness is minimized.  By the way, the sizing is terrific!  I wear size woman's 10 1/2.  Few companies carry this size in woman's shoes (mysteriously skipping from size 10 to 11), but the Zederna offers 10.5 and the insoles fit like a dream into my European sized shoes.  I am on my third purchase of Zederna insoles.  Having confirmed the size I use, I now purchase the insoles in three-packs.

I wish the cedar scent was stronger.  Other than that, really, they are perfect in fit, comfort, and, to a lesser degree, eliminating foot
odor.  I sprinkle some baking soda underneath to help.
These work better than any product I've ever tried and I have tried them all! At first I thought they were a little pricey but they are worth every penny. I would highly recommend these.
I really like how I can wear my loafers without needing socks. These insoles definitely absorb the sweat and my feet don't stink after wearing my loafers without socks for 8+ hours.

reviewText: These insoles fight odor much better than the insoles you can buy at the grocery store or drug store. I have tried many types of odor eating insoles, and these work the best. They are more expensive than other insoles, but they are better than others. They run a little narrow if your sizes are wide, and the size seems to run a tad bit small, though not much.

Foot odor is as good as gone, which is really neat. However, the sweat, which for me is a more pressing issue, has not changed at all. I commend whomever's sweat has been curbed by these insoles, but I cannot share in that experience.

**updating my review to mention that I do not like the residual smell that has since wafted in my shoes. I have actually replaced my shoes since, partially because of this problem.
summary: Odor on its way out, sweat remains

reviewText: These cedar insoles do a reasonably good job at preventing shoe odor. If your shoes already smell, these likely will have little effect on removing existing, excessive odor. They do help prevent odor, but some slight odor still develops in shoes that are worn nearly every day. I totally don't but the claims that tees inserted will cure and prevent athletes' foot and nail fungus. My real issue with them is how much they move around inside the shoe. I have large feet (size 13), and I purchased the largest size of inserts. There is some room around the edges of the insert , and they slide around inside the shoe like crazy. It was so irritating , I tried many different things to secure them. I tried double sided tape, and eventually resorted to stapling them to the regular sneaker sole insert. Even that only works for a couple of days. That irritation combined with them coming up short on their efficacy claims knocks them down to 3 stars, in my opinion.
summary: Works decently well, but is annoying

reviewText:
I ordered this top to use under my corsets. It's a thinner material, which is great because wearing corsets during any time of the year tends to get a little warm and during the summer (when we go to the most conventions) it's even worse, so I needed something with a thinner material to wear under my corsets so I don't overheat.

The frilly collar piece is great for steampunk and lolita outfits and I love the little pearl accents around the collar. I leave it unbuttoned a little bit, but it looks just as cute fully buttoned. It is a little short for my liking (hits me at just above hips), but I am wearing it under corsets and not by itself so it's not that big of a deal. The armpit area of the shirt it kind of odd. It's really large and shows more than desired, but once again, it actually ends up benefiting me in the manner I wear it (lets airflow so I'm cooler while being surrounded by a ton of people in a small space).
summary: which is great because wearing corsets during any time of the year ...

reviewText:
I think I ordered a medium but got an XXL. Maybe they adjusted based on differences in size between countries. Anyway, it is slightly too big. An XL or L would have been better I think. Anyway, it is a very pretty blouse. Fabric feels great. The pearls and the ruffles make it look expensive.

However, I had 2 problems. 1. The buttons are breaking off which is not a big deal because I can just sew them back on. But one of the buttons actually came broken, as in, it cannot be used again. I will have to try to source a button that looks somewhat like it. 2. The buttonholes are too small. Again not a big deal because I can use a razor to open them up some more.

All in all I'm pleased with the purchase for the price. I'm giving it 4 stars because it is too big so I will have to have it adjusted and one of the buttons came broken and they did not send any replacement buttons.
A very good natural product. Will buy again

For the price, I wish the cedar scent would last a little longer. I freshen them up with cedar oil every few weeks. Great product and about the only thing that consistently helps with my foot odor. Just wish the price weren't so high, as they do deteriorate within a couple of months.

reviewText: So nice and fun!

I have never left a review for anything on Amazon despite purchasing thousands of products from this marketplace over the years. I felt compelled to write a review for this item because it is so impressive.

I will say that this shirt may not fit everyone perfectly- The design of blouse's waistband may not lay at everyone's waistline and may fit more like an empire style depending on the length of your torso and also the size of your bust. On me it falls somewhere in between my underbust and waistline, but is much closer to my waistline.

If your build is not as petite as the model wearing it in the photo above, then I would advise ordering up at least two sizes. I actually purchased this blouse first in the size 4, which was a little tight. Then I purchased it is the size 8, which was definitely looser, yet not an undesirable look if that's how you like your clothing to fit. However I have re-ordered this blouse in the size 6 which, based on how the other two sizes fit, should be a perfect fit. After I receive the size 6 blouse, I will update my review to share the fit information.

In accordance with the other reviewers' opinions, it is an understatement to say that this blouse is high quality for the price. In my opinion, it is extremely high-quality compare to other blouses I've paid $100 or more. The shade of pink is an absolutely perfect 'petal' pink, in the material feels like silk! It's the perfect shirt  it can be worn for a casual/dressy look with jeans, or for a more dressy office or going out look- depending on how you accessorize it. I actually just ordered the green and white in addition to the pink in size 6 even though I've not tried the 6 on yet. Going by how the size 4 and size 8 fit, I'm pretty confident that the size 6 will fit just right. And if it doesn't I can just return them and wear the size 8 as a more loose, flowy style or take it to the tailor and have it taken in around the waist to look more fitted.

I know how difficult it is to buy clothing online bad get the perfect fit- especially the first time you order something- but, if this style appeals to you at all I would suggest ordering up two sizes and if it's too large for you don't like the way it fits then take it to a seamstress or tailor and have it altered-- it's totally worth it the small fee of having a seamstress alter it because the blouse is a STEAL at this price! I swear The quality of this blouse feels like that of an Equipment blouse or another high end designer! Now I just wish they had it in black too!
summary: Perfectly Pink at a Price You Can't Beat!!

reviewText: I bought these specifically to use as opened, untucked shirts over my usual sleeveless t-shirt when I want to look nicer.  To that end I ordered a larger size in the sleeves because when I drive or move around I don't want the sleeves riding up my wrists.  When I did wear the shirt tucked in and buttoned up I determined it fit me a little funny.  The sleeves were long enough that they didn't ride up, but the shirt was very baggy.  That't to be expected though, for some reason a shirt that actually fits in the chest is always too short on the arms.  But also, when I moved my arms the shirt is very tight around the arm holes and the shoulder area, which is odd because it's very baggy in the chest and stomach.  As an open, flowing shirt it works well, but it's uncomfortable to tuck in.  The material feels nice, which it had better for the price.  The color is appropriately black and not a light or faded black.  I can best describe the buttons as 'classy'.  The openings where the buttons are at the wrist aren't too large, which I've hated in other shirts.

reviewText:
It's a shame not to be able to rate this product higher.  Out of the box, it looks good and the quality is obvious. However, you can never get away from the fit issue and I am not referring to the waist.

No matter what your waist size, the contour package is unusually designed and way too small. Take a look at the photo provided. The contour is a  vertical pocket that is very small.  It really feels that this product is not made to accommodate an American male. So while you can find a fit for your waist, the fit issue becomes even more dicey.

In this regard, even should your shaft fit into this very small pocket, you have two other things to worry about.  Where are they supposed to go?  Further, even on top of this issue, the photo doesn't reveal that the front of the suit is more of a male's micro thong. If it wasn't contoured for a "shaft only" man, it would probably fit an woman very well. For her it would probably be a relief from a small size of a micro thong especially if her slit  happens to rise above the top of a micro thong.

So the front is lower than the rear coverage contributing to the lack of room in the front. At best, the front sits just on top of the base of your shaft.  While at first that might appealing, but there is a price to pay. The fits causes a number of other issues that are unsolvable including the de minimus length of the vertically contoured product. (If you adjusted your shaft up, nothing would remain behind in the pocket).  Also, the one inch sides automatically roll into a string creating the additional potential for a difficult fit.  I am not talking about it rolling up because of belly fat. I have none but it just is not wide enough to hold its shape and seems to have a memory built in to roll up. Strings sink into any skin/fat you have unless pure muscle is under it. Women more easily get away with it because we appreciate a woman's body and know that a six pack is not to be expected. So for a firm woman, a slight sinking in of the string is to be admired as sexy. For a man, well you just look fat.  If you still want a true g-string, you would be better off buying one that was designed as such which hopefully takes into consideration the geometry of a male and his parts.

If they just raised the front about an inch or two it would still be a hot suit which would provide more front room. Also, unless you want a g-string cutting across a region that might be difficult for most American males, you will continue to have a problem. So, they also need to figure out what width "string" will hold its shape; if the front is raised, as I referred to, the string might cut in a better region as the angles will change with the redesign of the micro patch into a little larger one.
summary: Doesn't take into account a male's three part needs.

3) The thing that really disappointed me was that the hat's stitching started coming off!!! It's that weak!
Now I know it's just $12 and you get what you paid for but I have used dresses for years that I have paid less for, from Amazon.
Anyway, it still LOOKS cute (I hand sewed it and decided to keep it because it wasn't worth returning so I just decided to give a rather detailed review) and I desperately needed a make-do hat!
Buy only if you are ready to have a hat that might not fit, has creases from the delivery and you can stitch it if it comes off!

I rely on Amazon reviews for all my purchases, regardless of where I end up making my purchase. I also understand the importance of accuracy regarding reviews. It is my objective to help others in making an informed, educated buying decision. That being said, I did received this product at a discount in an exchange of my review. This opinion is all my own and I do not gain anything from leaving a positive review and lose nothing by leaving a negative one.

And unfortunately, for a short person like me, that means I can't wear it by itself (which sort of defeats the purpose). It sucks because this would definitely be the kind of shirt to throw on on a hot summer day.

Apart from that, the quality is good and the material is soft and comfortable. Like other reviewers said, it doesn't look flowy like the stock picture but I do still like the style. I just wish it wasn't cut so low so I could get use out of it outside of my house. I'm going to try to wash it and see if it shrinks enough to make a difference.

Don't order unless you're a size XS, small or medium & are just looking for a very light cardigan.  I typically wear an extra large or 1X & ordered the extra large.  This item was so small I was unable to even get my arms into it to try it on.  If you're typically a size small or medium you could try ordering the large or extra large.  While dimensions are listed in the description, I just assumed from the picture this item would fit loosely and drape in a loose way.  Never assume.  Next time I'll read the description dimensions more carefully.  If you wear a large or extra large this product isn't for you.  This product is clearly sized for a population other than the USA.  I'm afraid shipping costs make returns prohibitive.  In addition, the fabric is extremely light...almost like chiffon or super thin rayon, which matches the description title, but the picture led me to assume the fabric would be a bit heavier.  Definitely not outerwear, or an item you would layer over anything with sleeves.  Could be a light summer cardigan, but don't expect the draping shown in the picture.  In person it was shorter than I expected after looking at the picture.  The beige color was a very pretty pink/beige, but the fit made this a 1 star item for me.
summary: Way too small!  "Plus" should not be in the description.

The shoes look much better in the pictures than in person. They are not well made, the lines are not smooth and the pair doesn't quite match; the left shoe shows much less toe cleavage than the right! Also, if it weren't for the insole, I wouldn't really be able to tell the left shoe from the right shoe. It's kind of a blob of a shape. The profile of the shoe however is quite pretty, except that the toes stick up off the ground when you stand--which is the tell-tale sign of a cheap pump.

All of my pointy-toe pumps are Louboutin Pigalles or Decolletes. Because of my new financial situation I decided to try these. These are nowhere near CLs, but are perfect if you are looking for a cheap, basic pointy pump. They look fine at night, in a dark bar.

I also considered the "middle" brands like Ivanka Trump, Jessica Simpson, etc, but the outlines/profiles of their pointy pumps are actually not as cute as these. Get these if the company you keep doesn't have a discerning eye. The shoe looks a little "off" if you know what a beautiful pump truly looks like. But if you're one who feels like a cute pump is a cute pump, then you'll love these. They are cute, just not at all fancy.

I ordered a half size up from my CL size, and the fit was fine.

I decided to return these, and get Pleaser Classiques, which I already own a pair of. The Pleasers are cheapo pumps too, but are more comfortable in my opinion.

The magnetic closure ensures nothing is going to fall out. It looks great as a shoulder bag or just gripped in your hand.  It does come with a strap that you could use to turn it into a cross body bag as well.  The leather is so soft and the straps do not dig into your shoulder.  It also arrived packaged in a protective white cover bag.  Overall, great purchase.

Top quality goat skin leather backpack. All zippers work easily. Draw straps are included to compact your load. The adjustment clips for the shoulder straps do not allow for very much adjustment leaving the straps too long. There are loads of pockets for storage - but, many of the pockets are really too small for use. These drawbacks are the only reasons that I didn't give the pack 5 stars.

It is just as described. Looks and smells great. Goatskin has a different smell as cow-skin but I just like the smell of leather period. More pockets then you can imagine. Snaps, zippers, buckles oh my. All hardware is very secure, with zippers being waxed. I seems they thought of everything. It wears very well. One small but, the shoulder straps are a little long and the cargo straps could use a few more holes. That's it. Leather, if treated right will last for ever!  Yes I will recommend this to others. .

reviewText: These are remarkably comfortable - No complaints whatsoever!!  The color is a unique blue, with grey overtones, which goes with just about anything imo - skirts, jeans, skinny jeans, leggings.  I usually wear 8-8.5, and the 8.5 is a bit loose on me (after wearing for a few hours) with thin socks, but I don't mind loose shoes/boots. At first, I thought they'd be really slick/slippery, so I was very careful when leaving the house, but after wearing for a short time (on pavement) they were no longer slick at all. I wore for a volunteer activity that involved a lot of standing/walking, and I was fine.  I thought I'd have a problem wearing them all day, so I brought a change of shoes that I did not need!  I then had to catch a flight at an airport about an hour away, so I had to walk to the end of a terminal, then later onto the jetway (carpet) . . . and the boots actually had traction!  (I first tried these on carpet - brand new, right out of box - and the non-heel sole was very slick.)  I did finally take them off that night, because I had to walk almost 3 additional miles . . . and I was at my limit by that point . . . .  :-)

First to begin with, the dress is beautiful, probably the prettiest dress I own. Ordered on March 17th, 'twas delivered on the 23rd and my freight forwarder delivered it to me today (31st).

Bought a size 2, smallest size they had and if you check their size chart, that means 32.5" bust, 25.5" waist and 35.75" hip. My measurements are 31"-23.5"-34.5". So naturally I thought I would have to have it tailored somehow. However, it fits me exactly. Not like a glove and not slack. It just fits.

Regarding material. It's quite thick as it has to be able to hold all the appliques. It's sturdy.

Regarding the length. I'm 5'3.5" and with a 5" heel, the front of the dress skims a mere quarter of an inch from the floor. The train at the back extends out, I would say about 18" from my feet.

I bought this in dark black. I honestly don't know what the difference is compared to the regular black one besides the price difference and the photo used. I didn't want to chance it because the pictures of the dark black dress was what caught my eye. The gold beading is not very gold, but it's not as light as champagne.

The front is see through, from the waist up, but it's just as shown in the photos, so no surprises there. There are two padded circle bra cups on the inside. I'm a shy one sometimes, don't like feeling too exposed and these do an excellent job covering you without having to worry at all. I'm a small C cup. The see through part is a skin color see through material. Not black see through.

Lastly, be prepared to lose the stick on beads where ever you go. So please, no crimes in this dress, they'll easily know it was you lol

Photos were taken with flash and without. The ones without were taken in a room with warm white lighting.
Beautiful and amazing quality. This dress was so well made and extravagant that I ordered 2 more for my sister and sister in law. Thank you!

reviewText: Not great quality but decent for $20 bucks. Ordered a size up based on other reviews and it fits.
Well made, very roomy, wish the straps were more reinforced. This will be my go to travel bag.

I bought it for 3 reasons: 1. Its large size compared with most other similar backpacks.  2. Real leather. 3. Price.

Upon receiving it, I am glad to see that it is true to size and made of mostly good quality leather.

However I can also see why this bag is priced at only $51. Its design and workmanship are not first class. Its two shoulder belts are made of two layers of thick leather, which is good in terms of durability. But the metal loops at the bottom of the bag are too small for one of belts to go through . It took me a lot of efforts to push it through (The paint on leather is a bit sticky). Most worrisome is that the leather that holds these metal loops at the bottom are made of only one thin layer of leather (The thickness of the leather over the whole bag is not even). That makes the thick belts all unnecessary because the thin leather down there will break first when the weight in the bag exceeds certain level. A sensible design should double the layers of the leather holding the metal loops too.

The positions of holes on the strap of the top flap are too low. I have had to puncture three more holes myself. Overall the leather is thick and heavy. But I think it is too heavy for a backpack to carry around. Also the smell of the bag is very strong and unpleasant, and there are oily stains on the cotton layer inside the bag.

Beautiful, thick leather. Actual metal buckles. This is a whole lot of bag for 50 bucks, folks. There is also a leather drawstring at the top of the pack to cinch the opening. I didn't catch that before i bought it so thst was a nice surprise.
I just got it so I can't speak to its longevity yet. I promise to update this if it falls apart...but the stitching looks pretty darn good to me.

After searching through countless sketchy looking sellers, I put my faith in this seller.  Boy am i glad I did! I was delighted for it was delivered a day earlier than expected! I was prepared for a ok looking bag but its precisely what the picture looks like!  It's beautiful.  I will definitely be ordering from you guys again. Everything is stitched tight and cleanly. Actual buckles not magnets. Perfect.  I HIGHLY  recommend.

I searched long and hard on Amazon for back pack that was a) Leather, b) Quality Hand-crafted, and c) Used actual buckles (not snaps or magnetic clasps) and this bag is all that. It is a well-made and authentic backpack from another time when such things mattered. The long note that came with the bag from the artisans who made it show real pride in their work, care that you are happy with your purchase, and concern that it lasts for years to come...something too all missing from run-of-the-mill manufactures of 'made in china' mass-produced and synthetic back packs.

If there is anything negative to say (and I won't even take a star off for it) is that the brass fittings are somewhat sticky because of the oil used to treat the leather, but it comes off easy enough with a little cleaning. Some people just react badly to "sticky" so fair warning.
summary: Real buckles on a leather backpack? You bet!

I should first point out that this pair of underwear is in no way a boxer.  It is actually between the leg length of a trunk and a brief; very short.

The fabric is soft, comfortable, and stretchy. Allowing for plenty of flexibility to move without constriction. The leg holes are the perfect amount of tightness/looseness (against the skin without being tight) and there is plenty of room in the seat of this underwear (without having fabric sag on your behind).
The waistband is smooth, comfortable, and durable. I did not experience any roll over with this waistband.
I would say there is no leg ride up with this underwear, but the legs are so short there is really no place to ride up.
The pouch is the best feature.  It offers plenty of room and stretch, while offering excellent support.
There is no seam running down the back middle of this pair of underwear, which is a nice change of pace from other N2N brand underwear (no wedgies from a seam).
This is really a great pair of underwear, but I am deducting a star as these are clearly not a boxer.

-In Short-
Pros:
Comfortable, soft, and stretchy fabric
Comfortable, smooth, and durable waistband
Excellent pouch with plenty of room and support
look good on

Cons:
Leg length is way to short to be considered a boxer.

*Please click "Yes" if you found this review helpful. It would be appreciated. Thank you.
summary: Great pair of underwear, but closer to a brief

MAKE SURE YOU CHECK YOUR ONESIE BEFORE YOU WEAR IT IN PUBLIC!!
first of all sizing, this is my first onesie ever: im around 5'3 got the small and it fit pretty well and was pretty baggy still but length wise it was perfect....

now onward to the product review:
got my stitch onesie late saturday afternoon and didn't check the onesie carefully enough. wore it to Disneyland literally the next day and within 10 minutes of walking into the the park the ZIPPER broke #_# and i had to hold the bottom part up with my completely different color legging showing (super embarassing). went to the the first aid place and got 4 safety pins to try to hold it up since after the zipper broke i realized it wasn't even sewn on properly. normally at the end of the zipper there is a plastic piece at the end that connects the 2 sides, well on this onesie it didn't have one. so of course my zipper wasn't working properly. after 3 rides and safety pins poking my butt and not holding up at all, i gave up on the onesie and changed out of it. once we finally got to sit down a bit i took out the onesie to try to fix it cause i had no spare jacket so i was freezing. got crafty and stuck one of my safety needles right at the end where the plastic piece was suppose to be. put the zipper back in and it stayed on the rest of the night. for the price yeah i know it wasn't too expensive but would like to at least put the zipper on properly since it sags right at the booty area.

havent been to disney in like 6 years and really wanted to make this experience worth it cause 1. disney tickets are $$$ and 2. i'll be moving out of LA to europe so it would have probably been my last time. but sadly spend the first half of the day worry and fiddling with this onesie instead of enjoying the theme park
summary: check check check before you wear in front of people

This is such a cool, cute swim cap! It's both fun and functional! Oh, my goodness! I remember these swim caps from when I was a little girl - I believe synchronized swimmers wore them. I'm going to be the hit of my water aerobics class! This is a swim cap that makes a statement. Why be dull when you can be fashionable in the pool? Vintage is in! This cap does the job. It keeps my hair fairly dry and keeps it from getting mussed up while in the water. It's not the kind of cap that keeps your hair perfectly dry; rather it's much like a watch that is water resistant, but not waterproof. It keeps my hair dry during water aerobics where there's splashing and a bit of dipping under water, but for swimming where your head is underwater most of the time, it would help from getting your hair wet, but it wouldn't keep it completely dry. It's a heavy cap made with thick material (I'm not sure, but I believe it is latex - that might be a drawback if you're allergic). It has a rim on the inside to keep the cap from slipping on your head.
I received this swim cap at a discount in exchange for my fair and honest opinion and review.  I'm thankful for the opportunity to try it. I'm obviously very pleased with this swim cap.
summary: FUN AND FUNCTIONAL RETRO SWIM CAP

reviewText:
For what you pay for this bikini, it's pretty good quality. You'd pay double easily at another retailer for something similar. I expect it to last a summer or two before beginning to stretch out. Bikini is true to size and looks the same as in the picture. I'm 5'10" and 135lbs and bought a medium. I find it to fit on the low rise side, but nothing that makes it a deal breaker. For people who don't like super cheeky bottoms, this one isn't too bad. Shows a bit more cheek than I'm used to, but isn't something that will make me feel uncomfortable in public.

These shirts look and fit nice, but they are VERY delicate.  They cannot be washed with any other clothes.  If you do so, they will emerge from the wash with several feet of threads pulled out of the seams and wrapped around your other clothes.

Part of the problem is that the ends of the seams are not finished properly, but simply dangle from the termination point.  On my second shirt, I tried sealing the dangling threads myself with a little bit of flame from a lighter, but they still came apart in the wash.

Be prepared to wash them by hand.

My husband needed some new polos for wearing to work (business casual) for summer and I didn't want to spend a ton of money. Occasionally, he can get called into the field, delivering medical equipment, and his shirts sometimes catch a snag or get roughed up, etc. I scoured a ton of reviews here on Amazon, searching for the best polos I could find for under $20 a piece... The less the better, lol, they do add up! I purposely chose a different color in each of the best rated, good valued polos I found for him. This way, if there were any he cared less for, it wouldn't be a huge deal (he is pretty picky!), and if he especially loved any, then I'd order more in those brands and cuts... Well, good news, this polo was a winner! Smile. Happy wife! This one was less his favorite in fit and more so mine. Not too tight but nicely snug around his broad shoulders! The arms are cut a bit longer and its not as wide overall, compared to others. I took some photos that show care instructions, collar, side slit (to show if it has one or not) and fit on him. This polo being 100% cotton was the heaviest weight of those we purchased. For reference, he is 6' tall and weighs about 240 lb. I ordered and received it in an XXL. We feel this was an excellent value and would recommend it to others. Ordered it in Ash Grey and it arrived as advertised, a nice light grey, and washes up nicely. (We wash as instructed but hang dry all of his polos.) In case anyone else happens to be looking for some good inexpensive polos... A few others we purchased, aside from this one, and are happy with are as follows (I'm posting reviews with photos for those also): Classroom Men's Short-Sleeve Pique Polo Shirt Port Authority Men's Silk Touch Polo 054x Hanes Adult Comfortblend Ecosmart Jersey Polo 054X I will update this review down the road should any hold up better than others. Hope this is helpful!
summary: Good Value Men's Polo and A Few Others......... See Photos ~

reviewText: Perfect! And for those who criticized the set because the Fez and the bow tie are slightly different shades of red (the bow tie is more of a wine/maroon) - those people obvious don't watch Dr. Who. This is a set based on Dr. Who, and in the series when the Doctor (Matt Smith) is sporting a fez and bow tie, they are slightly different shades. This set is true to the description and the series. So, if you are looking for a set reflecting the show (for Cosplay/Halloween), then this is a great choice! The only legitimate concern is that the Fez is not full-size as in the show. reviewText: The picture clearly shows that the fez and bowtie match, but what was received did not. Hat was bright red, tie was dark red. If I didn't need it sooner I'd send it back.

First I would like to say that it arrived in good time, and is a good quality. The fez does NOT need to be pinned on as the answered question states; mine came attached to a nice metal hairband. It is comfortable and slides right on, keeps the fez secure and adorable. Both the fez and bow tie were good quality. My only reason for the three stars is I am tired of Amazon product pictures and descriptions NOT matching up with the product. The fez and bow tie pictured are both bright red. I specifically wanted them both bright red. However, when I received the product the fez was bright red as pictured, but the bow tie is not- it is maroon. Had the sellers picture shown a maroon bow tie with a bright red fez, I would have bought a different set. As it is, I had to order another bow tie to match the red fez. I realize the 11th Doctor wears a maroon bow tie, but his fez MATCHES it. I am having a jacket made and I could only find a bright red lining for it, so I wanted the bow tie and fez to match the lining- in other words, to be bright red!  I am pleased with the quality of both, I am just really tired of sellers not posting pictures that match the product, or not giving accurate descriptions of them. This has become far too common on Amazon.

I have been looking for a nice watch to fit my husband's large wrist.  He had surgery done and metal plates inserted, and a lot of watches do not fit him anymore.  I know that some reviewers have mentioned the size of the band comes large, but this has worked in our favor!

The Chronograph Military Sports Black Stainless Steel Wristwatch has 3 sub-dials for the chronograph minute, and second, and the 24 hour indicator.  It comes with a cleaning cloth, as well as a pin pusher to adjust the size of the band.

The large face is stunning, and it complements my husband's wrist pretty well.  I like that it can glow in the dark, and the fact that it is water resistant.  There are no numbers with the number indicators, which reminds me of a very known watch that is many more times expensive than this one.  The black colored band definitely makes this watch look fancy.  Because of the style, this watch can be worn during business meetings, weddings, and pretty much any occasion.  This watch looks more expensive than (currently at $26.99), and if you go to a retail store, a watch like this would price much higher than that.  I have attached some close up photos to see some more detailing on the watch face and the band itself.

P.S.  This product was provided at little or no cost to test and give my opinion, and I never let that influence how I rate or review a product.  I make no promise of a good rating while testing a product.  I have found that writing reviews has become an enjoyable hobby of mine.  I love it when I know that I have made people's day when writing a helpful review (if not, why).  Please let me know if you have any questions or comments, and I promise to answer them as quickly as possible (usually within 24 hours) based on my experience with the product.
summary: Beautiful Watch For a Great Price!

So cute
so bad

Like many people, I am extremely skeptical of the clothes I purchase online. I scour the reviews for every item prior to agreeing with myself that I should buy it too. However, now and then an extremely cute item will pop up - completely unreviewed, with no one to vouch for its comfort, durability or fit. Despite the lack of feedback, there is every temptation to buy that item. To risk or not to risk...?

I did. I couldn't resist the sexy plunge line, the romper-like appearance that preserved a more flirtatious feel with a skirt instead of pants, and the soft colour that I was sure would compliment my skin. I ordered size medium, according to the guide. I was so excited when the package came in. Here is what I found:

The Good: the material is super soft and silky, and the colour was true to what was advertised

The Bad: I don't know who the designer intended to clothe, but it felt like I was trying to put on a child's dress. Although there is a zip on the side, this hardly does anything for helping the top of the item to pass over one's shoulders. I managed to squeeze into it, only to find - unsurprisingly - that the zip would not budge. The front of the dress also gaps quite a bit - some clothing tape is certainly needed to ensure that you're only showing what you want to be showing. Now, I do not have particularly broad shoulders, and my waist is quite average, so this was a total disappointment.

Overall: this is a gorgeous dress, so it's quite unfortunate that it could not fit. I haven't decided whether to gift it to someone else for Christmas, or try to sell it. It may not make much sense to attempt returning it. I would advise anyone interested to order a size up, but I have no idea if that will change the situation with regard to the top of the dress being unable to pass over the shoulders. One star for being durable enough to squeeze into; another for being durable enough to peel off (with assistance, this time).
summary: Gorgeous... if you can squeeze into it

This belt is stunning! I bought this belt for my husband since he last black leather belt was way beyond used. This belt is 100 times better than the old one!
The black leather belt itself is so soft. It is not hard and rigid like most belts. He says it is very comfortable to wear all day at work. It isn't overly shiny and has a very professional look to it. He has worn this to the office and out to a casual dinner, it goes seamlessly with both.
It has a very unique belt buckle design. Very modern! This is the first time either of us had ever seen or used a ratchet style buckle. It is easily our new favorite style. This allows for a perfect fit, every time! This belt would be perfect if you have a couple of sons that could share the belt since it can fit such a wide variety of sizes. It holds tight and does not loosen throughout the day.
Overall, I am so impressed with this Vbiger Fashion Men's Ratchet Belt. It is an amazing quality and looks great. I received this product at discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
summary: This belt is 100 times better than the old one

reviewText: Very nice belt. The leather is good quality and is stitched on the back of the belt so that there are no seams on the edges. Other belts I've had always peel or fray along the lengthwise edges of the belt at the buckle. I have only had this belt for a few days, so I can't yet speak to its longevity and durability, but if the construction and quality of appearance are any indication then this belt will last a long time. The buckle itself is stout! This is not a cheaply made buckle! It's all metal with no plastic parts and looks very nice. I LOVE the ratcheting buckle for a number of reasons. First, it's easy to buckle and adjust right where you want it. Second, the belt stays flat and doesn't have to "snake" through a traditional style buckle where belts usually wear, tear or fray. Shipping took a long time since I think it comes from overseas, but I can't imagine anyone is in a huge hurry to get a belt overnight :). I'll report back if I have any problems with it after I get a few more months under my belt. <-- See what I did there?
summary: Solidly built, A+, good quality, great design

reviewText: I bought this wig unaware of what to expect; every blond wig I've ever purchased had been a disgusting mustard yellow color. I was expecting the same from this wig, but to my surprise it came in the most beautiful pale blond color. 100% accurate for Len!! I was expecting nice quality anyway from what I've seen of their cosplays, but it was even more of a relief along with the gorgeous color. It's soft and beautiful and not too shiny at all so it looks sort of natural. It isn't necessarily spiky, if you want that kind of boxart extreme spike look you're going to need gel, but there are some layered (is that the right word?) bits at the top that are fluffy in a way that makes them sort of stick out. It doesn't look as bad as I'm probably making it sound--it works GREAT even without styling!! Perfect length, perfect color, perfect style, perfect EVERYTHING! The bangs are also extremely easy to position and part in any way you choose. 10/10 would definitely recommend!!
It does not come with a pony tail or enough hair to make a pony tail as shown in picture. Good quality wig, although I now have to find a new wig for Len.

reviewText:
This dress is really nice in person! I was pleasantly surprised. It is made of quality material and properly line. Definitely not itchy at all with all of the sequins.

I ordered the size 8. I normally wear a 4/6 and I am 5'4". I tried the dress on with 3.5" heels and it actually fit nicely in the front. The train in the back is a bit much and does not work for the event I am going to. You would need to hold the train up to avoid the dragging or it being stepped on if your are dancing.

It laces up in the back...takes quite a bit of work to lace it up as there are about 20 loops on each side. That being said, it definitely allows you to customize the fit.

I ordered it in the red as well...but in a 6. I did not try it on because I did not want to go through the hassle of lacing it up. I suspect it might be too small in the bust area as the blue was a tad small. I am a 34/35 full C bra size....definitely overflowing in the bust area. I would order up a size if you are larger than a B cup. The hip area was nice with a little room...this is where the size 6 might have been a better fit.

Next time, when I have time, I just may order this dress again and have it altered. Even with alterations this dress would be less than most formal dresses.

Sizing is very important here! The dude that lives on the couch is a 38 in nearly everything, and some things a 36 (so typically US Large- XL). I ordered the XXL size and it fit him near perfectly. There was just enough space for him to get a finger or so in the waist band and the rest wasn't too tight, except it really hugged his booty! I do love the color and the tree design. The color is almost as pictured a sort of canary yellow and black.

Although the pockets are mesh, the actual shorts are not lined with anything. That means the ol' twig and berries just goes flippity flopping all around in there if you don't wear something to holster them in. Wearing something under them may be a good idea too, as the material is pretty thin and will hug ones junk when wet. Also, it seemed to go a little translucent so HELLO Frank and beans!

There were a few strings hanging off the bottom that needed cut off. Not a huge deal, but often more quality items will not have as many strings left on them. Could also be an off day for the person in charge of that (string cutting has to be a boring job).

I am giving these a 4 star rating. The size chart is accurate go large, but there really needs to be about another 2 inches booty room, unless you like seeing the outline of the crevice of doom. Also a lining would be nice to hold Bradford and the pair a little more steady and protect them from being seen as easily.

I received this item at a reduced price for my fair, honest, and I hope somewhat fun review. I strive to provide my honest feedback from my (or the dude that lives on the couch) experience with the products I test. Your milage may vary. Please a a second to rate this review either "helpful" or "unhelpful" it lets me know what information you need.

reviewText:
I got these beach shorts for my husband for our upcoming summer trip.  All he ever buys is dark grey and black bland shorts and I decided he needed something a bit more him and fun for our vacation.  The quality of the material is very good and even after washing them I do not see any fading or breaking down of the material.

I was a bit concerned  that the colors may be a bit too bright for my husband as I was already pushing the envelope with the color and the palm trees, but surprisingly he said the likes them and they feel good when he put them on.  The only problem we have had is that we got the largest size available and they are still a bit too small right now.  But I think with some weight loss they will fit just fine when our vacation rolls around.  I would say that if you are going to buy these, make sure you remember they run a bit small so you get the appropriate size.

*Disclaimer**

I got these shorts for my husband for our upcoming vacation.  I thought the palm trees would be a great fit for a tropical destination.  Before ordering I did read other reviews to see about sizing.  I will say my husband is a 32 x 30 and we ordered the XL (definitely bigger than the US M) due to the reviews about sizing.  I am happy to report they fit perfectly.  I am not sure even the XL would fit any larger than a 34 waist with room to move.  My husband likes the design and feel of the shorts which is extremely soft.  The downfall of this item is that there is NO lining.  I read that and made the decision to get the yellow/green vs the white.  The white you would most definitely be able to see straight through.  He is not too concerned because the shorts won't really be worn out in public and if he does wear them out to a public place he can wear something under them.

My best advice to anyone looking at these shorts is to definitely take the time to read the reviews so you have an idea of the sizing and what size to order.  It can be tricky when it is Asian to US sizing.

This product was received at a discount for my honest and unbiased review
summary: PLEASE check reviews about sizing before ordering!!!

reviewText:

I did not expect they wouldn't even go past his thighs.  The XL ran more like a US Medium.  So they won't be worn any time soon unless my son loses a ton of weight.  I was very disappointed in the sizing but that was mainly because the quality was very good. But if you purchase sizing correctly these would be a great pair of swim trunks!

My Bag did not come with LOCK Instructions so I'll explain what to do for anyone else missing lock instructions.
The Lock is pre-set on an "000" combination.
To set to your 3 digit combination, hold the thumb latch pulled back in the Open Position, and while holding
in the OPEN position Set your 3 digits and then close up the thumb latch.
The 3 digits you put in will now be your combination.

reviewText: I purchased this item at a discount on Amazon in exchange for an honest review.  Upon hand/eye inspection, the seams appear to be well sewn and the elasticity feels moderately firm.  My husband wore these to work and provided me with the details for the comfort and moisture wicking information.  He explained that the socks were comfortable in the morning; however, around mid-afternoon, he started to notice them bunching under the ball of his foot.  My husband wears a size 9.5 shoe, so these should be well within his size range.  He ended up taking off one of his shoes and readjusting the sock.  After that, there were no further problems that day.  On the second day, there were no problems, and he did not notice any difference in comfort of these socks and his cotton socks.  While it has not been extremely hot/cold weather, it has been extraodinarily humid, and my husband said that he did not feel any moisture or rubbing from the socks/shoes.  Sounds like the moisture wicking works!

If you're not looking for anything high quality then I say try it out. But don't expect anything fancy...

I would not buy one again. I would definitely look into higher quality brands.

reviewText:
Just got this watch, so I cannot say anything about its durability. Here is a list of my initial observations

Pros:
- Looks really good
- Should go well with formal clothes
- Watch seems to keep track of time pretty well
- Winding the clock is easy
- Relatively simple to remove links

Cons:
- Brass look is actually some sort of color on stainless steel, so I am not sure if it will fade with time
- Watch is a thick, at around 1 cm
- Instructions included are not really helpful since they are for a different model of watch
- The glass looks like it might easily scratch

Overall, if you want a watch that looks really good, but don't care about features and are not too worried about the accuracy of the time, then this watch is for you. For this price, I think it was a good deal.
summary: - Looks really good - Should go well with formal clothes - Watch ...

It's a beautiful watch, but the leather it mentions for the watchband... unless the part between the man-made surfaces of the band are leather (most unlikely) the band is not leather. The black leather-like facing seems so thin that I fear it will wear out quickly; crack and peel. Otherwise the watch is just beautiful. Do hope the watchband will be replaceable though. This is my second self-winder by Alienwork and so far, I'm quite happy with them. Their appearances are unique and although I've only had the other one 2 weeks, they seem reliable. Unless something changes, these watches are a solid buy.

reviewText:
These DO NOT RUN SMALL; at least, not the pair I got (dark brown). They are spot on. Maybe they once ran small and the seller has tweaked the sizing since the initial offering but they are definitely not small like I expected based on some customer's reviews.  I measured my son's foot (barefoot) as 6 inches which equals 15.24 cm (after I plugged it into online conversion calculator) which would closest to a size 8 according to the size chart. The size chart included in the listing is pasted below. I should have ordered a size 9 (16 cm according to size chart) by the seller's advice to go up one size for wide/fat feet which would have allowed plenty of room but I heeded other customers' warnings and ordered a 9.5. I don't see a 9.5 marked on the shoe...the bottom states 27/185 (which I'm assuming is foreign sizing). The shoes are a good half size or more too big but they are wearable with a pair or socks. I would return them for a 9 but they are not currently offered through Amazon Prime and would take a couple of weeks to arrive. These sandals are very attractive and appear to be good quality with nice, soft leather. I got these dark brown sandals for my almost 2 year old. They are very cute for him to wear this spring/summer!! I hope this review has helped you choose the right size!

US Size 5=13.7 cm, US Size 6=14.2cm, US Size 7=14.7cm, US size 8=15.2cm
US Size 8.5=15.5cm, US Size 9=16cm, US Size 9.5=16.5cm, US Size 10=17.3cm
US Size 11=18cm, US Size 11.5=18.5cm, US Size 12=18.8cm, US Size 12.5=19.3cm
US Size 13=20cm, US Size 1=20.7cm, US Size 2=21.2cm, US Size 2.5=22cm

reviewText:
Disclaimer: I've never owned a cycling kit before. This is my first foray into cycling kits.

That being said, I love this kit. It's incredibly comfortable and makes a huge difference on my rides. I did order two sizes larger as recommended. I'm 5'10" 215 lbs with a more muscular build. I ordered the 2XL and it fits great!

Ok, so I bought this dress on an impulse buy, found it on Pinterest and fell in love, except for the fact that it could only be purchased online. Devastated! I'm such a skeptic about buying things like this online that I literally had to have a friend tell me to just order it. After ordering, I started to really worry that it was a scam (have friends who have bought things for "great deals" in China and never received them). I emailed the company, just really hoping that they would email me back, which they did within 30 mins! They assured me the dress would come in the window of time that I requested in my email (which was 5 weeks prior to the estimated delivery date). Still being the skeptic, I had talked myself into this being too good to be true and was preparing to make an appointment with a local bridal shop. To my surprise (I ordered the dress on Dec. 9), the dress arrived at my house YESTERDAY (Dec. 29)!  Tried it on, and it fits perfectly!! Too long, but I'm short! Definitely take the advice on here and measure yourself, the order the dress in a size bigger than your measurements!! That's what I did and it is perfect!!! Very well made and fantastic quality! Wouldn't change a thing!
summary: Don't be fooled by the location, the dress is FABULOUS!!!!

reviewText:
It's kind of what I expected for 8 bucks. I gave it 4 stars because I do like it overall. However, it does not fit me. I got a large and it says a large fits sizes 12-14. I am a size ten. I could barely get it over my shoulders. I'd say it's more of a size 4-8 ...because of the fabric I was able to pull it down but it is so very tight.
Update: Tried it on again and I have to say I really like it. I am 5'8 1/2 and 160 lbs with a tummy. I should have got an XL but being my first time ordering from China, I didn't know about the sizes running small..so that's on me. The dress is VERY clingy, at least on me and doesn't have the swing it does on the model. It's also a lighter color, but very pretty!! I love the length, it's very short. The fabric I love...just enough stretch. I am a 36/B, maybe c. It's also pretty see through, but with the right color underwear and bra it works. I love that I can wear any bra and you can't see the straps. Like I said though, it is a clinger. lol I wouldn't suggest it for people with a lot of meat, and it is NOT FREE FLOWING. I kind of look like a sausage. Can see my belly button right through it. Ok, adding photos. This dress is made for someone with a tight, toned figure. Even with an XL I'm not sure I could pull it off in public. Keeping it, because I hope to lose the winter weight around midsection and wear it....I do love it. One loose thread on the tummy area that I can fix. Seems to have been made pretty well. Over all glad I bought it for the price. I see a lot of reviews on other dresses about sizing and how it's not made well, but for under ten bucks and a weird sizing system..it's a gamble. Oh, it also came in less than two weeks. I'm satisfied and will be ordering more...maybe this one in white. Thanks :)
summary: SIZE is SMALL...beware, but VERY cute!

reviewText: These shoes help me tremendously with squats.  I have poor ankle mobility these help me maintain proper form in the bottom of my squat (front and back).  These are also great if you have flat feet like I do.  I actually picked these because I read somewhere that these were the best power lifting shoes for flat feet.  I regularly shop on amazon, but I bought these elsewhere as the price here is way too expensive (you should be able to find them for around $170) as of 11/1/2016.
If you take your lifting seriously these are the shoes for you.

The best Olympic weightlifting shoe on the market today is the Romaelos II, made by Nike.

This shoe has several benefits, which include its unprecedented heel support, lightweight material, comfort of the sole, two Velcro straps to secure your foot, and the durability of the material.

Heel Support

One great feature about the Nike Romaelos II is the stability and size of its heel. Its wedged heal is great for not only Olympic weightlifting but powerlifting as well. Although the cost of this shoe may be slightly higher than a similar product, you receive the quality brand that is paid for. The heel of the Romaelos II is also much sturdier than other competitive brands, such as the Adidas Adipower.

Lightweight

The weight of this shoe is another large reason it is a top of the line product. When the athlete wears the Romaelos II, there is little to no difference in the weight compared to an average tennis shoe. This proves to be a huge advantage to those performing Olympic lifts while wearing the Romaelos II in comparison to the lifters who may be wearing something else.

Comfort

The comfort of this show is remarkable, as the Romaelos II can be worn even when not needed during the workout. Another luxury of this weightlifting shoe is that the athlete may forget they are still wearing the shoe due how they feel. Beyond that, the shoe was smooth and easy to break in. Contrary to similar products, you can expect little to no pain when attempting to break in the shoe.

Velcro Straps

The two hook-and-loop Velcro straps are a large advantage on the Romaelos II as the lock in the foot of the competitor throughout the entire workout. The top strap, although long when tightened, plays a significant role in the effectiveness of the workout because it secures the heel so well. With other shoes, some people have had trouble with their heel slipping out while doing lunges or even while performing a jerk. This top strap allows the lifter to complete their workout worry free of slippage ever happening. The second strap near the toes of the shoe simply allows you to tighten beyond what the laces may provide.

Durability

Lastly, the durability of the Nike Romaelos II is extraordinary. For nearly 1 year, the shoes have held up and look as new as the day they were purchased even though they have worn at least 3 times per week throughout that time.

I bought these shoes for a friend and he loved them. They looked and fit as expected. Special mention for excelent communication with seller and super fast delivery to Miami before we had to come back to our country.

reviewText: After purchasing a previous (black, small) pair of these shorts about a year ago, I felt they were decent quality enough for the price, they arrived much quicker than expected, and they fit perfectly; so I kept them. Sadly shortly after, the very cheap buttons began to pop off one by one. So I had to remove the buttons and replace with nicer quality ones. I ended up taking a chance and buying another pair (blue, small). I received them in the mail today; a little over a month after the order was placed. As soon as I took them out of the bag, I noticed they looked too large. They sent me size medium. They are much too large for me to wear. I am 5'6", 97lbs, measurements are 22" waist, 36" hips. As other reviews mentioned, the button holes are much too small to actually get the buttons through, even when forced. I believe these new shorts are also a different brand than the previous ones, so I feel this is (in a way) an almost deceptive item to buy now. They are not really worth the time, money, or effort to send them back... Very disappointing. They are OK quality other than these issues. They have very cheap buttons as well, but they may hold up better due to the different brand. They look similar enough to the photo. I believe these are a hit or miss (likely the latter) product, so buyer be cautious of sizing issues and being sent the wrong product.
